## FingerprintsEnroll.enroll() method

Enrolls a fingerprint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enroll(position: FingerPosition | Finger, samples: BioSample[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | <code>FingerPosition &#124; Finger</code> | a position of a finger to enroll |
|  samples | <code>BioSample[]</code> | a collection of fingerprint scans. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to perform the enrollment or reject in case of an error.
